SotN#27: Is ETH Money? w/ Ryan Selkis (2020 Recap & 2021 Horizon)

Every year, Ryan Selkis does a round-up of the themes that powered the industry as well as some predictions of the year to come.Â 

It covers the movers and shakers that steered the industry for the year. Among Ryan's list are people like Hayden Adams of Uniswap and Danny Ryan from the EF.Â 

Yet, Ryan Selkis is still pessimistic on ETH as Money, and believes the tailwinds of the industry point elsewhere.Â 

We bring on his points to the show, and go through them to discuss!

Ryan's Crypto Theses for 2021:
https://messari.io/crypto-theses-for-2021Â
